duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct psychiatric assessments and evaluations of patient mental health.
Provide interventions and treatments for individuals with mental health disorders.
Deliver patient care, including medication management and therapy sessions.
Conduct diagnostic evaluations and analysis of patient mental health conditions.
Maintain accurate and detailed medical records of patient interactions and treatment plans.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Medicine (MD) or Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine (DO)
